title: Time and Again
description: Widow Kate Fenwick had reason to be afraid. The dark, brooding stranger who had mysteriously appeared on her farm was in serious trouble - and he desperately needed Kate's help. But how could she leave her two precious children to travel back in time to the hot deserts of Texas?If this Jack Ramsey was who he claimed to be, Kate had no choice but to help him stop a cold-blooded killer from stealing his life again. But if she succeeded in helping Jack, she could lose the only man she could love - forever.
author: Kathryn Jensen
